title: I've Been Hacked :/
body: Hello guys, how is your day? good? mine isn't, so basically I was hacked (I know their name but no naming or shaming) and my main got perma banned because of them, this has been really annoying so all I'm asking for is some help, so now my main is banned and I have to use a low level smurf, so if you can help then Thank You!

replies.body: If you can write into our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and verify yourself as the account creator, those agents should be able to help you get back into that account.
